fragment: Walt enters into a partnership with a former student to cook crystal meth as a means of supporting his family.
Skyler reconciles with her sister Marie and confronts Walt about his recent behavior.
Jesse tracks down the couple who ripped off his friend and witnesses a violent altercation.
Hank suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder after a bombing and struggles to fit in at his new job.
Marie mistakenly believes that Walter Jr. is smoking marijuana and asks Hank to scare him straight.
Walter Jr. is busted by an undercover cop for trying to purchase beer as a minor.
Saul becomes Walt and Jesse's lawyer and helps them with their drug business.
Gus becomes the new distributor of Walt and Jesse's meth after Tuco's death.
Mike is a cleaner and one of Saul's associates who also works for Gus.
Jane is Jesse's neighbor, landlord, and girlfriend who is in recovery from drug addiction.
